title: Hina Khar, German minister discuss regional, global issues
content:
ISLAMABAD, Mar 6 (APP): Minister of State for Foreign Affairs Hina Rabbani Khar Monday here held a meeting with Germanyâ€™s Minister of State for Foreign Affairs Dr. Tobias Lindner.During the meeting, she lauded the recent momentum in the relations between Pakistan and Germany.The two sides stressed strengthening of bilateral ties in trade, investment, education, vocational training, renewable energy, migration and people-to-people contacts. They exchanged views on regional and global issues.
